content: https //blog clover-usa com/2021/06/28/summer-slice-drawstring-bag/ here s the perfect bag for some summer fun the summer slice drawstring bag is crocheted with light/dk size 3 yarn in a striped spike stitch design the hooks used for this project are clover amour hooks in size 7/4 5mm and k/6 5mm and the yarn is omega sinfonia finished measurements 10 high 9 5 wide strap 46 materials omega sinfonia light /dk weight size 3 mercerized cotton yarn 3 5 oz/218 yds/100 g per skein 1 skein each of #863 camel camello #816 teal azul nordico #819 light olive olivo intense #869 gold oro and #842 cinnamon canela size 7/4 5mm clover amour crochet hook size k/ 6 5mm clover amour crochet hook stitch markers tapestry needle scissors
